title: "Organizing and Scientific Committee"
---
### Subheader

```{=html}

<style>
  .image-description-container {
    display: flex;
    flex-wrap: wrap; /* Wrap cards to the next line if necessary */
    gap: 20px; /* Adjust spacing between cards */
  }

  .image-description-card {
    flex: 1; /* Equal width for all cards */
    padding: 20px;
    text-align: left;
  }

  .image {
    max-width: 100%; /* Ensure images scale appropriately */
  }
</style>

<div class="image-description-container">
  <!-- Use a Quarto loop construct to generate multiple cards -->
  {{ for card in cards }}
  <div class="image-description-card">
    <div class="image">
      <img src="{{ figures/keynote0.jpg }}" alt="Image Alt Text">
    </div>
    <div class="description">
      {{ card.description }}
    </div>
  </div>
  {{ end }}
</div>
```
